title: 100M Wireless Remote Control Shutter Release for Panasonic DMC G3, FZ50, FZ100, 50K, 50S, 30, 30K, 30S, 20, 20K, 20S, LC-1, L1, Leica Digilux 2, 3
description: Pixel RW-221 is a high performance wireless shutter remote control and supports single, continuous, bulb, and 4s delay shooting mode. It can control multi receivers and cameras. RW-221 uses the FSK system and the world wide free 2.4GHz frequency (FSK modulation is used to improve the reliability and stability of the product). You can also use it on a different brand or make of camera simply by ordering a new connecting cable. RW-221/RS1 is compatible with Leica DigiLux 2, DigiLux 3, V-Lux 1, V-Lux 2, V-Lux 3, Panasonic FT 2, FZ100, FZ15, FZ150, FZ20, FZ200, FZ30, FZ50, G1, G10, G2, G3, G5, GF1, GH1, GH2, GH3, GX1, L1, L10, LC1, TS2, TZ10, ZS7.
